location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Horace Walpole, India Office to Colonel Sir Lewis Pelly, KCB, KCSI

physicalDescription.extent: Watermark: The paper contains two watermarks - 'Brittania' and 'Cansell, 1870'.

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Pelly's request to succeed Sir Alfred Wilde on the Council of India and reporting on Lord Salisbury (Robert Gascoyne-Cecil, 3rd Marquess of Salisbury)'s response that they require someone with a detailed knowledge of the Army in India for the vacancy as the council currently lacks that expertise.
